CmdLine:
echo "deb http://http.debian.net/debian stretch-backports main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list &&     export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive &&     apt-get update &&     apt-get -y install     openssh-server     sudo     rsync     procps     -t stretch-backports 	gnupg2     openjdk-8-jdk-headless=${VERS_PACKAGE_JAVA}     openjdk-8-source=${VERS_PACKAGE_JAVA}     wget     unzip     mc     locales     ca-certificates     curl     bash-completion &&     mkdir /var/run/sshd &&     sed 's@session\s*required\s*pam_loginuid.so@session optional pam_loginuid.so@g' -i /etc/pam.d/sshd &&     echo "%sudo ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL" >> /etc/sudoers &&     sudo echo -e "deb https://fr.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu ${VERSION_UBU} main universe
deb-src https://fr.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu ${VERSION_UBU} main universe
deb https://fr.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu ${VERSION_UBU}-security main universe
deb https://fr.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu ${VERSION_UBU}-updates main universe
deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/ansible/ansible/ubuntu ${VERSION_UBU} main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/sources.list &&     apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys A1715D88E1DF1F24 &&     apt-get install git subversion python3-pip ansible -y &&     apt-get clean &&     apt-get -y autoremove     && apt-get -y clean     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
